meanings.definition: A person or company that sends goods to be sold by another.
meanings.sent1: The consigner shipped the products to the store for sale.
meanings.sent2: The consigner dropped off the items at the auction house.
meanings.sent3: The consigner accidentally sent a box of socks instead of shoes.
meanings.sent4: The consigner was like a silent partner in the sales process.
meanings.sent5: The consigner carefully selected the best items to send for auction.

meanings.definition: To send or deliver goods to be sold by another.
meanings.sent1: She consignered her handmade crafts to the local shop.
meanings.sent2: He consigners his artwork to galleries around the city.
meanings.sent3: The consigner quickly consignered the antique furniture before the move.
meanings.sent4: They consigner their surplus stock to online retailers.
meanings.sent5: The consigner consigners the goods with great attention to detail.
